participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, Amina is someone who values freedom and independence. She is introspective and often thinks deeply about her experiences.
participant_1.background: i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was in my early twenties. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, Emily has a creative spirit. She enjoys bringing joy to others through her baking and crafts.
participant_2.background: i've a few dogs. i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.
